name: Use of power of sale foreclosure in certain non-mortgage situations
text: [§667-40]  Use of power of sale foreclosure in certain non-mortgage situations.  A power of sale foreclosure under this part may be used in certain non-mortgage situations where a law or a written document contains, authorizes, permits, or provides for a power of sale, a power of sale foreclosure, a power of sale remedy, or a nonjudicial foreclosure.  These laws or written documents are limited to those involving time share plans, condominium property regimes, and agreements of sale. [L 1998, c 122, pt of §1]
